name: Night Out
description:
Looks like you have a Date to go to! Excited? You should be! Play with 1-4 people remote play as you rush to your table to have the best Night Out! Solve Puzzles, do parkour, work together, and GET TO YOUR TABLE!

Initially created as a relationship game, we still believe that Night Out isn't just fun but can also fix cracks in friendships and relationships...To create a better foundation for your friendships...relationships...and courtships. Created by Wicked Pixels we will push toward our goal of creating something fun, challenging, and communication-driven.


Sometimes it's better to play by yourself. With solo mode, we bring you levels that will force you to have precise parkour skills and use your brain. Solo mode is a great way to grind on XP, and TIPS!
  • Levels built for one person
  • Grind TIPS to use in the shop
  • Different levels from Co-op!
  • Complete the level with a 3 Star!


Night Out is a cooperative online platformer puzzle game for 1-4 players
Only one thing is important...FIND YOUR TABLE! With tons of Levels (And more to come each season) we bring to you special, fun gimmicks, and challenging levels! You will have to communicate with your peers in order to successfully get to your table and have a wonderful Night Out.
  • Funny and Happy Times!
  • Work together! Its all or nothing
  • Levels built for fun and help communication skills
We plan on releasing game modes such as a 2V2 mode and a 4 Player CO-OP later in our game release...


  • Customization: Colors
  • Remote Play
  • Different ways to play
  • Loot Box System and Featured Shop
  • New Challenges
  • Achievements
  • Secured Data
